title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1183/98 of 8 June 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 220/91 laying down detailed rules for the application of Regulation (EC) No 952/97 on producer groups and associations thereof
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1183/98 of 8 June 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 220/91 laying down detailed rules for the application of Regulation (EC) No 952/97 on producer groups and associations thereof
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Annex to Regulation (EC) No 220/91 is hereby amended as follows:
1. The particulars relating to the following CN codes in Table IV are replaced by the following.
>TABLE>
2. The particulars relating to the following CN codes in Table V are replaced by the following.
>TABLE>
3. The particulars relating to the following CN codes in Table VIII are replaced by the following.
>TABLE>
4. The following table is added.
>TABLE>
5. The particulars relating to the following CN codes in Table IX are replaced by the following.
>TABLE>

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 June 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 142, 2. 6. 1997, p. 30.
(2) OJ L 26, 31. 1. 1991, p. 15.
(3) OJ L 53, 2. 3. 1996, p. 1.
